location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Photographic printDimensions:452 x 361 mm, on sheet 490 x 384 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Outline map of the Qatar Peninsula copied from the British Admiralty Chart No. 2837b and enclosed with a copy of Report on the Air Reconnaissance carried out over Qatar on 11 October 1935 (folios 72-73). Classified ‘Secret’.Shows the reconnaissance route with direction indicated. Contains a table with place names and coordinates listed.
